LanguageData.GUC_StatPart_MountMoveSpeed: Mount move speed (overrides pawn move speed)
LanguageData.GUC_StatPart_HandlingMultiplier: Multiplier for handling skill of rider
LanguageData.GUC_StatPart_HandlingMovementImpact: Speed impact per level (configured in mod settings)
LanguageData.GUC_HandlingAccuracyImpact_Title: Accuracy impact(%) per animal handling level
LanguageData.GUC_HandlingAccuracyImpact_Description: If the animal handling skill of a pawn is below the level that would be needed to tame the animal, this is a per level-penalty. Otherwise it is a per-level bonus.
LanguageData.GUC_HandlingMovementImpact_Title: Movement impact(%) per animal handling level
LanguageData.GUC_HandlingMovementImpact_Description: If the animal handling skill of a pawn is below the level that would be needed to tame the animal, this is a per level-penalty. Otherwise it is a per-level bonus.
LanguageData.GUC_AccuracyPenalty_Description: Accuracy penalty when pawns are mounted
LanguageData.GUC_BodySizeFilter_Description: Filter mountable animals by body size
LanguageData.GUC_Animalselection_Description: Use the filter above to filter by body size, and click tiles to make exceptions
LanguageData.GUC_Drawselection_Description: Configure which animals should be drawn in front of pawns, and which ones should be drawn behind pawns. Most animals should be drawn behind pawns, but some (especially animals with long necks or horns) look better when drawn in front of pawns
LanguageData.GUC_NotInModOptions: Cannot mount, animal not allowed in mod options
LanguageData.GUC_NotFullyGrown: Cannot mount, animal not fully grown
LanguageData.GUC_NeedsObedience: Cannot mount, animal needs to be tamed
